app.introduction: 蝉之翼锁屏拥有独立的三屏设计，每一屏都有其专属功能，分别为时间、天气、音乐，向右滑动快速进入相机；在时间页面时，时钟区域向下滑动还能更换头像、昵称和个性签名，打造专属你的个性！
app.introductionEn: Cicada Wings lock screen has an independent three-screen design, each screen has its exclusive features, namely time, weather, music, slide right into the camera quickly; pages at a time, the clock can slide down the area to replace the picture , nickname and personalized signature, to create exclusive your personality!
